verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: expected] [ARG1: to sign the bill to allow terminally ill patients to receive experimental drugs not approved by the U.S. FDA]

President Donald Trump expected to sign [ARG0: the bill] to [V: allow] [ARG1: terminally ill patients to receive experimental drugs not approved by the U.S. FDA]
President Donald Trump expected to sign the bill to allow [ARG0: terminally ill patients] to [V: receive] [ARG1: experimental drugs not approved by the U.S. FDA]
President Donald Trump expected to sign the bill to allow terminally ill patients to receive [ARG1: experimental drugs] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: approved] [ARG0: by the U.S. FDA]
